reviews.text:
Shout out to the staff
And the pizza was awesome
I love this pizza, really juicy slice. Service was a little slow and they gave me the wrong order but no biggie, just check your box before leaving. Food is so good that I‚Äôd come back anyway
nr 36streetStn

They keep the neighborhood fed, pizza is top notch, nicest people inside, and
one of the best vodka slices in the city üî•

The best pizza , I celebrate my son birthday at the Nurf  gun arena in industry city and  gravensand pizzeria in sunset park cater my party , we order the  margarita pizza, vodka pizza, cheese pizza , pepperoni pizza , mozzarella stick , Cesar salad and everything was excellent on point . The delivery was on time . We love it !!
Excellent pizza and service. I‚Äôm extremely indecisive and they were very helpful with helping order the right amount and picking the correct delivery time for my son‚Äôs birthday. üíõüí´

Excelent pizza. Great value for money. Start with 1 slice. They are pretty hefty. Great topping great crust.
Nice guy behind the counter.
such good pizza, especially the buffalo chicken slice

I‚Äôve been here two times about 4 years apart and both times the chef has come out the back and given me something on the house. I don‚Äôt even know him, it‚Äôs a little pricey but the food is great i would definitely stop bye
Solid slices, pies, and food!! Get the lasagna and granny slice!!!
Great Pizza, service and atmosphere.  A must visit for anyone who loves quality food

Amazing pizza, great customer service and I
never have to wait long for my food
Pizza is delicious and affordable!! Great staff, great food would highly recommend! Everything is fresh and served quickly!!
La pizza √® molto buona, il personale √® sempre gentile e sorridente e il locale √® in una zona tranquilla, ottimo se volete una buona pizza a Brooklyn
Amazing pizza and customer service, 100% recommend to anyone visiting Brooklyn!!!
Very good pizza slices, fresh and warm!! My favourite is the Sicilian vodka slice ü§§
We ordered  3 sliced of pizza but 2 pizzas came
Amazing service and ever better food check it out highly recommend

Friendly staff. Generous.
Big portions
Try the vodka sauce pizza and grandmas! Delicious
Delicious and KIND PEOPLE!!!!
Best pizza in Brooklyn!

Literally best pizza I‚Äôve had in decades. Caught me off guard. So good.

Only thing that makes good pizza better is killer service. Thank you Chris and all the cook staff!
Best pasta on entire brooklyn!!!
Food comes out quick and is always delicious
Consistently delicious truly best pizza in Brooklyn!
Best pizza in Brooklyn. Won a blind taste test we did with family between 14 other pies.

Awesome food, kindest service ever!
10/10 would recommend
legitimately my favorite pizza in brooklyn
Overall best pizza place around!!
Was visiting Brooklyn for the weekend and wanted some pizza and this was the spot. Chris took care of us and provided us with delicious pizza all with a smile. Will be back!
Delicious pizza and friendly staff! A must try! Shout out to Chris!
Was so hungry I forgot to take a picture but the pizza was delicious, vodka slice & extra cheese slice with a can of DC 100% the way to go
Great variety. Their Vodka Square is my favorite!
Best Pizza and Ravioli we ever had! No cap!
Delicious pizza slices served by very friendly people. I recommend!

I come here every Friday for the best pizza and pasta IN NEW YORK!!! This place is soo underrated I recommend anyone around the neighborhood or that live in ny to STOP BY AND TRY THEY FOOD!! They won‚Äôt disappoint. And the staff here ARE GOOD VIBES AND COOL PEOPLES I APPRECIATE THEY SERVICE AND IF ANYONE SAY ANYTHING BAD TO BE HONEST THEY HAVE TO A BE A ‚ÄúKAREN‚Äù !
Good variety and great tasting pizza at a reasonable price. Staff are helpful and service is fast. Seating is cramped and can be uncomfortable when crowded.
Love
yummmm
Fantastic pizza
Straight vibes- vodka slice was on point ‚Äî- so fresh I for it straight out of the damn window no heat needed-

We stopped by this pizza place while driving, and unfortunately, the experience was disappointing ‚Äî not because of the pizza itself, which was just okay, but due to the lack of customer service.

The place is very small, with only two tables inside. One was occupied, and since there were three of us, we waited to use the other. While we were waiting, a staff member was unpacking sodas and placed a dirty box on the table we were clearly waiting to use. She saw us but continued without acknowledging us. Once she finished, I politely asked if they could clean the table, since the box had clearly been on the floor before.

They looked at me like I was asking for something unreasonable ‚Äî as if the table looked ‚Äúclean enough.‚Äù We ended up eating outside.

Honestly, the lack of basic customer service skills really took away from the experience. I won‚Äôt be coming back.
Simple good tasting pizza.

I work near Gravesend Pizza, and stop by on my way from the subway on 36th Street. The pizza is delicious. My go-to is a white slice and a vodka slice. Fantastic food and fantastic atmosphere. Would 100% recommend if you are in the area.
Best grandma
There are only two small picnic tables for indoor seating and not much space.  The food however is Top Notch and the pizza was the best we found in Brooklyn
Very nice staff and delicious grandma pizza
Great chicken roll and the sauce to go with it was amazing.
Chris and the guys were fantastic. Every aspect was awesome, will certainly be back and will recommend to everyone who asks.
Every slice I‚Äôve had has been great! Also shoutout to my man Chris for always showing love to everyone and creating a great atmosphere!

Today, I decided to take a walk through Sunset Park to find something to eat, and I came across a new pizza restaurant I had been wanting to try for months. As I walked in, what immediately caught my eye was a heart-shaped sign that read: "Valentine's Day Heart-Shaped Pizza Available."

Not only do they offer the traditional style, but Ernesto mentioned they can also make a fruit version with Nutella, strawberries, or bananas. That got me excited! The staff was warm and welcoming, making the experience even better.

Gravesend Pizza is located at 181 34th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11232. They serve a variety of dishes, including pastas, wraps, rolls, soups, and calzones. They even offer catering!

I ordered a vodka slice, and Baby Ernesto cooked it with love. If you're in the neighborhood, this is definitely a pizza spot to add to your must-try list! üçï‚ù§Ô∏è

A chill pizza spot that has great slices and garlic knots for a reasonable price. There are always good slices to choose from whenever I‚Äôm here. The pic might not look like it as I took the last two slices from the bottom shelf. They are great!!

I just order lasagna wings ,and pizza my pizza is ok but my lasagne looks like nachos the pasta is so dry hard  we don‚Äôt like And when I called, the person who helped me was in such a hurry that when I ordered the pizza he wanted to end the call without asking if I wanted anything else. What's going on? They don't want to sell anymore? My wings were already in bad condition and look at the containers they send with mold, can you imagine the quality of hygiene? I'm sorry, I will not order food from that place again

We came here after walking around in the area. The store was spacious and had ample seating area inside and outside. The restaurant had tons of pizza options available. I had ordered a large cheese pizza but had to wait a few minutes because they had none available. It didn't take more than 20 minutes for the pizza to be ready.

My friend ordered a vodka pizza slice and I tasted half. It was delicious and tasty. It was filled with flavor and had the perfect amount of sauce to cheese. The plain cheese pizza came  out piping out. It was a good size and had a good amount of cheese and sauce. The sauce was fresh and looked like homemade tomato sauce. However, it lacked flavor and tasted bland. It had no salt or seasoning once so ever. I am not sure if its because they were rushing to make the pie that they forgot the spice or if that's how it is made. I wouldn't come back for the plain cheese but I would get another vodka if I was in the area.

Bring cash as they charge a fee for credit cards.

Some of the best Sicilian-type slices.

Their vodka slice is amazing.
Their upside down slice is amazing.

What makes them so amazing is their crust. It‚Äôs a thick crust, but it‚Äôs airy, light and baked to perfection. Coated with a perfect crisp, the perfect crunch of each bite is maintained throughout the consumption of the slice.

Have authentic Ny style pizza, in Brooklyn!
Bucket list check ‚úîÔ∏è
This is the best pie in Brooklyn hands down, the flavors are on point and the sauce has depth. If you're a foodie this is what you're looking for, attention to detail. These cats are proud of their pizza and it shows in everything they do. The dough is traditional, light and delicious
We went to Gravesend because we wanted to experience Brooklyn in a bite and they delivered full stop

Best Pizza spot in Brooklyn. Diamond service and food. From the margarita slice to Sicilian slices the pizza here is amazing. Let me not forget the star of the show! The best garlic knots in town. I invite anyone to try them and see how real it is. Gravesend 5 star vibe.

The pizza is AMAZING!!! Grandma and regular slices, both fantastic. If you catch the focaccia freshly made‚Äîmiraculous! And the staff are all so kind and friendly. I like it best Sinatra is on the speakers when I come in. üòä
We‚Äôre so lucky to have such good pizza in this neighborhood! üçïüçïüçï
Good pizza. They use the higher end pepperoni. Prices are good and the pizza is crispy. The pizza is on the saucer side, but overall they have a good balance of cheese to sauce ratio.

I'm absolutely in love with the margarita slice. I was born and raised in NYC and I can say this is my favorite slice of pizza ever. The crispness is perfect, sauce is the perfect, cheese is super stringy. It even tastes amazing if you bring it home . I usually buy two pies since I'm all the way from queens. Even freezing and reheating the next day its godlike. ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞

One of the best pizza joints in Brooklyn! Not only is the pizza delicious but the service is even better! Friendly, respectful, professional service and top notch food! They legit surprised us with a heart shaped pizza ‚ù§Ô∏è amazing people and delicious food üç± üçï highly recommend this place üôè‚ù§Ô∏è

This was my first time visiting Gravesend Pizza! And I was greeted by Chris. He was a beyond kind, friendly, helpful and overall great vibes! The service was best that I have ever received from a pizzeria. The pizza was also really flavorful I got a vodka slice and meatlover pie! I will definitely be coming back !!

I had an absolutely delightful experience at Gravesend. Their signature Grandma Pizza was a true standout‚Äîcrispy, fresh, and packed with flavor in every bite. You can really taste the quality of the ingredients and the care that goes into each slice. The staff were amazing‚Äîso friendly, welcoming, and attentive, making the whole experience even better. My mom loved it just as much as I did, and that says a lot! If you‚Äôre in the mood for delicious pizza in a warm and inviting spot.
I definitely will be back ‚ú®ü§ç

Solid slices! Visited on the latter side of the evening and had a margherita slice and vodka square even though I wasn't very hungry to begin with.  Not much seating though but definitely fine for a takeout pizza joint. Will be back when in the area!

Fresh, large slices with a variety of options :)

We started with the bbq chicken and Grandmas slice, then went back for a plain cheese and white slice. All delicious!

Kind, friendly service by the cashier who  will serve your food to the table when dining in.

This place is great. Came here after a long day and ordered an upside down slice with a soda. It‚Äôs a small pizza shop but boy does it pack in flavor. The women at the front brought my slice with free samples of focaccia with an amazing tomato sauce. In 10 years of living in NYC have never felt so grateful and happy to receive such wonderful service and yummy samples. Huge by the way and so tasty.

I recommend and will be returning to this Classy Pizzeria in Brooklyn.

First time having an Authentic New York pizza - wow.  The picture says it all (Grandpa Pizza).  Crust, sauce, and toppings all top notch.

Looking forward to returning and trying some of the other styles as well.

Great place . The service was amazing. The cashier Marco was the best. The pizza was amazing.id highly recommend you guys try this place out !!!! Also interesting to know is the Brooklyn Nets practice facility is a couple of blocks away and they always purchase their pizza and sandwiches here ! If I could give it 10 stars I would!!!

I placed an order from gravesend on doordash and was having some trouble with it getting delivered. I called the store and the staff was so kind and helpful. Major props to them they even offered a free diet coke. This was my first time‚Ä¶
Bardzo dobra pizza i w super cenie - 25$ za du≈ºa peperoni ü•∞

My partner and I just recently moved to Sunset Park, and this is one of the best pizza spots in Brooklyn. This has become our go-to for when we order pizza take out. Highly recommend the Grandma‚Äôs pie and the vodka pie. Also there plain cheese pizza is solid too. Fair prices for the quality!

If you're in the vicinity of Green-Wood Cemetery are feeling dead tired & hungry but still alive this is a good place to grab a bite. The upside down slice may be what you want or can choose the other options. This is a nice place to relieve oneself of dead presidents. It won't kill you (at least it shouldn't).
If I could give them 10 stars I would! The pizza was absolutely delicious & the service was superb! Plus, the prices are extremely reasonable. They treated my family of 6 so well! Thank you ‚ò∫Ô∏è!

The store was opened not so long ago.  Today I tried it.

2 pieces and soda - 5 bucks for it.  The cheese is very hot - be careful.  The dough is thin and crispy.
There is only one drawback - the dough is not very airy.

But that's my personal opinion.  Maybe that everything will be fine for you

Stopped here on a whim while showing a friend around Brooklyn. I wasn‚Äôt in the mood for pizza, but my cheese slice was delicious! The crust/undercarriage was crunchy, the sauce was flavorful without being too acidic, the cheese had pull. I‚Äôll be back soon to try the vodka slice.
Het eten was super goed. Klein maar fijne zaak. Vriendelijke bediening en schappelijke prijzen. Voor mij een ECHTE NEW YORK PIZZA ervaring in Brooklyn. Beter als de New York Pizza bij ons in NL.
Great pizza and great vibes! Sat outside with a couple of this margarita slices and it healed me üôèüèæ
Pizza veramente buona sia quella alta che la classica! I ragazzi sono stati veramente gentili! Se siete italiani nelle vicinanze andate a provarla!

We were invited in by Ernesto the owner on a rainy night and were treated like Queens. He told us he made the best pizza in New York and it is 100% true. It‚Äôs the cheese for me, and the mix of thin and fluffy crust. Its classic with a little something extra. I will definitely be taking every New York visitor here to give them a taste of the best of Brooklyn.  Thanks for a truly magical experience.

Ordered a chicken vodka parm. Bread sucked & was dry. Definetly not worth the $15.80. Also the momo working the phone told me 30 min wait. the sandwich was ready in half that time. I know this because I called when I arrived early to check because I was double parked. - Warm at best. Also, guy charged me $16 the total was $15.80. I dont need the money but I guess he does. I can only image what goes on behind the counter. Overall not a good  sandwich & experience wont be going back.
